meanings.definition: A person who is very knowledgeable and enthusiastic about a particular subject or activity.
meanings.sent1: As an afficionado of classic cars, he could identify any make and model on sight.
meanings.sent2: She is an afficionado of art, always visiting museums and galleries.
meanings.sent3: The afficionado of gardening had a garden so beautiful, it looked like a painting.
meanings.sent4: His passion for cooking made him an afficionado in the kitchen, creating culinary masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The afficionado of astronomy could spend hours stargazing and identifying constellations.

meanings.definition: A fan or enthusiast of a particular thing.
meanings.sent1: Being an afficionado of superhero movies, she had seen every film multiple times.
meanings.sent2: He was an afficionado of sports, always cheering for his favorite team.
meanings.sent3: The afficionado of fashion had a closet full of designer clothes.
meanings.sent4: Her love for music made her an afficionado of concerts, attending every show in town.
meanings.sent5: The afficionado of books had a collection that filled an entire room.
